Validation.Description: Validate no programmers have salary less than min
Validation.ValidationSQL: select * from hr.employees where job_id = 'IT_PROG' and salary < (select min_salary from hr.jobs where job_id='IT_PROG')

Validation.Description: Validate no programmers have salary more than max
Validation.ValidationSQL: select * from hr.employees where job_id = 'IT_PROG' and salary > (select max_salary from hr.jobs where job_id='IT_PROG')
